articles.description: According to a Financial Times report, over the last few months, the iPhone maker has posted dozens of AI jobs in the US, France, and China, looking to fill roles that could help build generative AI tools
articles.content: As Apple chief executive Tim Cook bets big on generative AI, the tech giant has posted several job openings in the field of artificial intelligence (AI) globally.Over the last few months, the iPhone … [+1712 chars]

articles.title: Garena Free Fire Max redeem codes for August 6, 2023: Claim daily free rewards | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Garena Free Fire Max releases new redeem codes daily for players to claim in-game rewards like weapons and skins. Codes are time-limited and restricted to the first 500 users.
articles.content: Garena Free Fire Max has released a set of new redeem codes for today, offering players a chance to claim a variety of in-game rewards, such as weapons, diamonds, skins, and more. These codes consist… [+2009 chars]
